name: Introduction to Engineering
description: This course introduces students to the engineering profession and provides an overview of the engineering disciplines.

name: Engineering Mechanics
description: This course covers basic principles of statics and dynamics, including forces, couples, structures, trusses, friction, and kinematics.

name: Material Science and Engineering
description: This course covers the fundamentals of materials science and engineering, including structure, properties, processing, and behavior of materials.

name: Thermodynamics
description: This course covers the principles of thermodynamics, including the laws of thermodynamics, the properties of fluids, and heat transfer.

name: Introduction to Materials Engineering
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of materials engineering, including the properties and processing of materials.

name: Materials Processing
description: This course covers the basics of materials processing, including casting, forming, joining, and machining of materials.

name: Materials Characterization
description: This course covers the fundamentals of materials characterization, including microscopy, spectroscopy, and mechanical testing.

name: Materials Selection and Design
description: This course covers the basics of materials selection and design, including the principles of materials selection and the design of materials components.
